SCENE_INTRO.name: Introduction
SCENE_INTRO.text:
Welcome to Arctic Gems! 
You start on a very cold Arctic morning, the sun is just rising and you can still hear the small plane that just dropped you off disappearing in the distance. 
You have been provided with a small shack, it doesn't offer a lot of protection 
Your mission, is to find the lost Gems of Capistrano. Good luck, you'll need it.

SCENE_001.name: The Start
SCENE_001.text: You are back where you started.

SCENE_002.name: The Cabin
SCENE_002.text: You are now in your small shack, there is a bed, sink, toilet, radio and a cabinet.
SCENE_002.first-text: You see something on the floor...and pick it up.

ITEM_001.text: You have found a sword, it has a strange red Gem in the pommel of it. You stick this under your belt...be careful.

ITEM_007.text: You have found a key...how strange. It has some engraving on it, it reads 'CAVE DOOR'. How convenient.

SCENE_003.name: The Thick Woods
SCENE_003.text: You are in the thick woods, huge snow-topped trees surround you. The snow here is thick.
SCENE_003.first-text: Good job you brought your sword, there's no running anywhere fast in here; that's way too dangerous.

unlocks.text: You notice a log cabin in the distance
